aerosol: none
atmos: ECHAM v6.3 (T63; 192 x 96 longitude/latitude; 47 levels; top level 1 Pa)
atmosChem: none
land: JSBACH v3.1
landIce: none
ocean: NEMO v3.4 (NEMO v3.4, tripolar primarily 1deg; 384 x 362 longitude/latitude; 46 levels; top grid cell 0-6 m)
ocnBgchem: none
seaIce: CICE4.1
